welcome_message_body: "Welcome to West Orange, a charming and historic city known for its picturesque landscapes and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer during your stay. Enjoy your time here!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport caters to executive and private flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Teterboro Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport is for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at LaGuardia Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A newly renovated terminal at LaGuardia Airport, serving major airlines such as Delta and American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A terminal at LaGuardia Airport, primarily serving Delta and Delta Connection flights.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: A terminal at LaGuardia Airport, serving American Airlines and American Eagle flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. No login or password required.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Serves international airlines such as Air France, Lufthansa, and Japan Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serves Delta Air Lines and Delta Connection flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Serves international airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, and Singapore Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: Serves British Airways, Alaska Airlines, and other international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Serves American Airlines and American Eagle flights.

wifi.note: Limited free access, premium options available for purchase.
